__comment__purpose: Example upload config. Copy to config.upload.json or generate via setup-client.ps1.
__comment__where_values_come_from: Most values come from .env or Terraform outputs.
__comment__aws_profile: AWS CLI profile name configured by setup-client.ps1 (SSO). Example: SecureUpload
__comment__aws_region: AWS region where the transfer bucket exists. Example: ap-southeast-2
__comment__bucket_name: S3 transfer bucket. Find in Terraform outputs or AWS console.
__comment__incoming_prefix: Upload staging prefix. Must match bucket policy expectations.
__comment__artefacts_prefix: Where manifests and hashes are stored.
__comment__kms_key_id: Full ARN of the CMK used by the bucket (SSE-KMS + client-side envelope encryption).
__comment__enable_client_side_encryption: If true, encrypt locally using AES-256-GCM before upload.
__comment__cse_chunk_size_mb: Chunk size for AES-GCM encryption; smaller chunks reduce memory use.
__comment__cse_manifest_suffix: Suffix for manifest file that stores encrypted data key and metadata.
__comment__use_transfer_acceleration: If true, uses S3 Transfer Acceleration (bucket must be enabled).
__comment__enable_upload_checksum: If true, writes SHA256 hash to artefacts prefix.
__comment__upload_checksum_algorithm: Hash algorithm; must match download verification. Keep SHA256.
__comment__store_ciphertext_with_enc_ext: If true, stores ciphertext with .enc extension for clarity.
__comment__enable_defender_scan: If true, runs Windows Defender scan before encryption.
__comment__enable_log: If true, writes logs to upload_log_directory.
__comment__upload_log_directory: Local log directory; created if missing.
